Episodes.Title: I Wasn't Ready
Episodes.Plot: Sentenced to fifteen months for a crime committed in her youth, Piper Chapman leaves her supportive fiance Larry for her new home: a women's prison.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, nudity, sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Natasha Lyonne, Deborah Rush, Nick Sandow, Todd Susman

Episodes.Title: Tit Punch
Episodes.Plot: After insulting the food in front of the prison chef, Piper is starved out by the kitchen staff and struggles to offer up an acceptable apology.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, nudity, sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Danielle Brooks, Laverne Cox, Joel Marsh Garland, Annie Golden, Natasha Lyonne, Matt Peters, Elizabeth Rodriguez, Nick Sandow, Yael Stone

Episodes.Title: Lesbian Request Denied
Episodes.Plot: Targeted for romance by a fellow prisoner, Piper finds that subtlety is an ineffective approach to letting her suitor down.

Episodes.GuestStars: Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Laverne Cox, Maria Dizzia, Joel Marsh Garland, Natasha Lyonne, Arden Myrin, Michael Rainey, Jr., Deborah Rush, Morgan Spector, Tanya Wright

Episodes.Title: Imaginary Enemies
Episodes.Plot: Piper gets to know her stern new roommate; the prisoners prepare a farewell party for one of their own; a misplaced screwdriver has dire consequences.

Episodes.GuestStars: Madeline Brewer, Danielle Brooks, Lea DeLaria, Joel Marsh Garland, Vicky Jeudy, Natasha Lyonne, James McDaniel, Matt Peters, Nick Sandow, Samira Wiley

Episodes.Title: The Chickening
Episodes.Plot: When her sighting of a legendary feral chicken polarizes the inmates, Larry wonders if Piper is getting too absorbed in the "fishbowl" of prison life.

Episodes.Title: WAC Pack

Episodes.Title: Blood Donut
Episodes.Plot: Piper wants the prison's outdoor running track reopened, but in order to get it, she'll have to give her corrections officer something he wants.
